message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm hoping we can make a deal. My starting price is $19,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I understand its value to you, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value. I could meet you halfway at $17,000. This is a very competitive price for a product of this caliber.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but given my budget constraints, I can only consider offers within my limit. I am willing to pay $14,000 for the product.
